title: Sibling Advicery with Chelsea Handler!!!
description:
The duchess of comedy, Chelsea Handler, joins Bob and Monét to give advice to Patreon subscribers! The power trio offers advice on aging, navigating casual relationships, defining femininity for yourself, and so much more!! You won't want to miss this hilarious episode!
Go to PrettyLitter.com/rivalry to save 20% on your first order. 
Go to uomabeauty.com/SIBLING or use promo code “SIBLING” at checkout to get 30% off site wide! 
For listeners of the show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to DipseaStories.com/RIVALRY. 
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
